common.name: Name
common.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters.

auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.signInError: Couldn't sign you in. Please check your email and password.
auth.signUpError: Couldn't create your account. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordSent: Check your email for password reset instructions.
auth.sessionExpiredDescription: Please sign in again to continue.
auth.signInToAccess: Sign in to access your account

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Here's what's happening with your screens today.
dashboard.gettingStartedDescription: Follow these steps to set up your digital signage.
dashboard.noScreensYet: You don't have any screens yet
dashboard.noScreensDescription: Add a screen to start showing content on a TV or display.
dashboard.visitHelpCenter: Visit our Help Center for guides and tutorials.

screens.title: Screens
screens.subtitle: Manage your screens and what they display
screens.screenNamePlaceholder: e.g., Lobby Display, Conference Room TV
screens.screenCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code shown on your screen
screens.noScreens: You don't have any screens yet
screens.noScreensDescription: Add a screen to start displaying content on TVs, tablets, or digital displays.
screens.addFirstScreenMessage: Screens show your playlists and campaigns. Add one to get started.
screens.rebootDescription: Restart this screen remotely. It will reconnect automatically.
screens.screenshotDescription: Capture what's currently showing on this screen.
screens.autoOnDescription: Automatically turn on this screen at a scheduled time
screens.autoOffDescription: Automatically turn off this screen at a scheduled time
screens.deleteWarning: This will remove the screen from your account. The screen will stop displaying content.
screens.pairingError: Couldn't pair this screen. Please check the code and try again.
screens.offlineWarning: This screen hasn't connected in over 5 minutes
screens.offlineTooltip: The screen may be powered off, disconnected from the internet, or experiencing issues.
screens.kioskModeDescription: Lock the screen to only show BizScreen content. Prevents users from accessing other apps.
screens.kioskModeTooltip: Kiosk mode disables the navigation bar and prevents exiting the app.

playlists.title: Playlists
playlists.subtitle: Organize your content into playlists that play on your screens
playlists.noPlaylists: You don't have any playlists yet
playlists.noPlaylistsDescription: Playlists let you organize media into loops that play on your screens.
playlists.itemDurationDescription: How long this item shows before moving to the next
playlists.transitionDescription: Effect when switching to this item
playlists.noItemsDescription: Add media, apps, or web pages to build your playlist.
playlists.deleteWarning: This playlist is assigned to {{count}} screen(s). They will show no content until you assign a different playlist.

media.title: Media Library
media.subtitle: Your images, videos, and other content
media.supportedFormats: Supports images, videos, audio, and PDFs
media.noMediaDescription: Upload images, videos, or other files to use in your playlists.
media.replaceDescription: Upload a new file to replace this one everywhere it's used.
media.confirmDeleteWarning: This file is used in {{count}} playlist(s). It will be removed from all of them.
media.usedInPlaylists: This media is used in {{count}} playlist(s).

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.subtitle: Schedule targeted content to run across your screens
campaigns.campaignNamePlaceholder: e.g., Holiday Sale, New Product Launch
campaigns.noCampaigns: You don't have any campaigns yet
campaigns.noCampaignsDescription: Campaigns let you schedule special content to override your regular playlists for specific times or screen groups.
campaigns.priorityDescription: Higher priority campaigns override lower ones when schedules overlap.
campaigns.priorityTooltip: When multiple campaigns are scheduled for the same time, the one with higher priority will play. Priority 10 is highest, 1 is lowest.
campaigns.targetScreensDescription: Which screens should show this campaign
campaigns.contentDescription: What to show during this campaign
campaigns.deleteWarning: This campaign will be removed from all scheduled screens.

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Ready-made designs to help you create content quickly
templates.noTemplatesDescription: Templates help you create professional content quickly. Check back soon!
templates.previewDescription: See how this template looks before using it

layouts.title: Layouts
layouts.subtitle: Design custom screen layouts with multiple content zones
layouts.noLayouts: You don't have any layouts yet
layouts.noLayoutsDescription: Layouts let you divide your screen into zones, each showing different content.

schedules.title: Schedules
schedules.subtitle: Control when your playlists and campaigns play
schedules.noSchedules: You don't have any schedules yet
schedules.noSchedulesDescription: Schedules let you automatically switch content based on time of day or day of week.
schedules.priorityDescription: Higher priority schedules override lower ones at the same time
schedules.priorityTooltip: When multiple schedules overlap, the one with higher priority takes effect. Use this to handle exceptions like holidays.

player.title: Player
player.offlineDescription: Content will resume when the connection is restored.
player.noContentDescription: Assign a playlist to this screen to start showing content.
player.pairingDescription: Enter this code in your BizScreen dashboard to connect this screen.
player.pairingFailedDescription: Please check the code and try again.
player.errorDescription: We're having trouble loading content. This screen will automatically retry.

serviceQuality.title: Service Quality
serviceQuality.subtitle: Monitor your screens' health and performance
serviceQuality.healthScoreTooltip: Based on uptime, response time, and sync status across all your screens.
serviceQuality.uptimeTooltip: Percentage of time your screens have been online and showing content.
serviceQuality.networkLatencyTooltip: Average time for screens to communicate with the server.
serviceQuality.contentSyncTooltip: How quickly screens receive content updates.
serviceQuality.noAlertsDescription: All your screens are running smoothly.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Understand how your content is performing
analytics.noDataDescription: Analytics will appear here once your screens start playing content.

review.title: Review Inbox
review.subtitle: Approve or reject content before it goes live
review.noReviewsDescription: When team members submit content for approval, it will appear here.
review.approvalRequiredDescription: This content needs approval before it can be published.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: Manage who has access to your account
team.noMembersDescription: Invite team members to help manage your screens and content.
team.roleDescription: What this person can do in your account
team.adminDescription: Full access to all features and settings
team.editorDescription: Can create and edit content, but can't change settings
team.viewerDescription: Can view content but can't make changes
team.inviteSentDescription: {{email}} will receive an email to join your team.
team.removeWarning: They will lose access to your account immediately.

billing.title: Plan & Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription and payment details
billing.trialExpiredDescription: Upgrade to continue using all features.
billing.limitReachedDescription: Upgrade your plan to add more {{item}}.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDescription: Choose the language for your dashboard.
settings.timezoneDescription: Used for scheduling and activity timestamps.
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive email alerts for important events.
settings.pushNotificationsDescription: Receive browser notifications when screens go offline.
settings.twoFactorAuthDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
settings.sessionsDescription: Devices where you're currently signed in.
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all your data. This cannot be undone.
settings.exportDataDescription: Download a copy of all your data.

demo.title: Demo Mode
demo.description: You're viewing BizScreen in demo mode with sample data.
demo.sampleDataDescription: Changes you make won't be saved. Sign up for a free trial to use your own content.

onboarding.title: Welcome to BizScreen
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get your digital signage up and running.
onboarding.step1Description: Connect a TV or display to show your content.
onboarding.step2Description: Add images, videos, or other content to your library.
onboarding.step3Description: Organize your content into a playlist.
onboarding.step4Description: Choose which playlist plays on each screen.
onboarding.setupCompleteDescription: Your screen is ready to display content.

enterprise.ssoDescription: Allow team members to sign in with your company's identity provider.
enterprise.ssoTooltip: SSO lets your team use their existing company credentials instead of separate passwords.
enterprise.scimDescription: Automatically sync team members from your identity provider.
enterprise.scimTooltip: SCIM automatically adds and removes team members when they join or leave your organization.
enterprise.auditLogDescription: Track all actions taken in your account.
enterprise.auditLogTooltip: Audit logs help you track who did what and when for security and compliance purposes.

reseller.title: Reseller Portal
reseller.subtitle: Manage your clients and their BizScreen accounts
reseller.noClients: You don't have any clients yet
reseller.noClientsDescription: Add clients to manage their BizScreen accounts.
reseller.impersonateDescription: Access this client's dashboard as if you were them.
reseller.impersonateTooltip: View and manage this client's screens and content. Changes you make will affect their account.
reseller.commissionDescription: Your earnings from this client's subscription.
reseller.licenseDescription: The plan assigned to this client.

errors.genericDescription: We're having trouble completing your request. Please try again.
errors.networkErrorDescription: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.unauthorizedDescription: You don't have permission to view this page.
errors.forbiddenDescription: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.serverErrorDescription: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.validationErrorDescription: Some fields need to be corrected before you can continue.
errors.sessionExpiredDescription: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.rateLimitedDescription: Please wait a moment before trying again.
errors.loadFailedDescription: There was a problem loading this page. Please try again.
errors.saveFailedDescription: Your changes couldn't be saved. Please try again.
errors.deleteFailedDescription: There was a problem deleting this item. Please try again.
errors.uploadFailedDescription: There was a problem uploading your file. Please try again.
errors.fileTooLargeDescription: The maximum file size is {{size}}MB. Please choose a smaller file.
errors.unsupportedFormatDescription: This file type isn't supported. Please use a different file.

search.title: No results found
search.description: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.

notifications.title: No notifications
notifications.description: You're all caught up! We'll notify you when something needs your attention.

activity.title: No recent activity
activity.description: Activity from you and your team will appear here.

tooltips.priority: Higher numbers take precedence when items overlap
tooltips.offline: This screen hasn't connected recently. It may be powered off or disconnected.
tooltips.kiosk: Locks the display to only show BizScreen content
tooltips.schedule: Schedules automatically switch content based on time
tooltips.license: The subscription plan assigned to this account
tooltips.impersonate: View this account as if you were the user

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.unique: This value is already in use
